entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Humboldt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
